sage.input.action

Interface IAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInputAction, LookDownAction, LookLeftAction, LookRightAction, LookUpAction, MouseLookAction, MoveBackwardAction, MoveDownAction, MoveForwardAction, MoveLeftAction, MoveRightAction, MoveUpAction, QuitGameAction, ResetCameraAction, RollLeftAction, RollRightAction, RunAction

    public interface IAction
    This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by all concrete subclasses of AbstractInputAction.
    Author:
    Russell Bolles

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void performAction(float time, net.java.games.input.Event evt)
      performAction() is invoked to perform the action defined by this IAction object.

    • Method Detail

      • performAction

        void performAction(float time,
                   net.java.games.input.Event evt)
        performAction() is invoked to perform the action defined by this IAction object.
        Parameters:
        time - -- the elapsed time for which the IAction is being invoked
        evt - -- the event associated with invoking this IAction
